docs.lead_paragraph: Two months ago, the World Health Organization launched an ambitious plan to stop the deadly Ebola outbreak in West Africa, aiming to isolate 70 percent of the sick and safely bury 70 percent of the victims in the three hardest-hit countries — Guinea, Liberia and Sierra Leone — by December 1.

headline.main: WHO Will Miss Ebola Targets It Set for Dec 1
headline.print_headline: WHO Will Miss Ebola Targets It Set for Dec 1

docs.snippet: Two months ago, the World Health Organization launched an ambitious plan to stop the deadly Ebola outbreak in West Africa, aiming to isolate 70 percent of the sick and safely bury 70 percent of the victims in the three hardest-hit countries —...

docs.lead_paragraph: GlaxoSmithKline will this week inform U.S. staff of hundreds of job cuts in its biggest market as the drugmaker starts implementing a major cost-saving program, sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday.

headline.main: GSK to Axe U.S. Jobs as Part of $1.6 Billion Cost Cuts: Sources
headline.print_headline: GSK to Axe U.S. Jobs as Part of $1.6 Billion Cost Cuts: Sources

docs.snippet: GlaxoSmithKline will this week inform U.S. staff of hundreds of job cuts in its biggest market as the drugmaker starts implementing a major cost-saving program, sources familiar with the matter said on Sunday.
